title: Beware the fink update-all
summary: Ahh, the joys of upgrading Fink for OS 10.2. I started it Monday morning on both my iBook and the dual G4 450 I have at work, and they're both still going at it.
content:
Ahh, the joys of upgrading Fink for OS 10.2. I started it Monday morning on both my iBook and the dual G4 450 I have at work, and they're both still going at it.

shortname=ooobge
